pkgmetadata.longdescription:
This is a simple linear algebra math library in Common-Lisp. It contains datatypes for 2 and 3 dimensions.
It provides some simple algorithms commonly used for computer graphics, like rotation, transformation, scaling and interpolation of vectors. It also provides functions to convert between different representations of rotations, namely matrices, quaternions, euler angles (yaw, pitch, roll) and axis/angle.
